@usedefault
{{html:
<h1>DNS</h1>

<input class="input-large" type="text" data-bind="value: newDomain().name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
<select  class="input-large select-large" data-bind="options: buckets, optionsText: 'name', value: newDomain().bucket, optionsCaption: 'Select bucket...'"></select>
<input type="submit" value="Add Domain" data-bind="click: addDomain, enable: !!(newDomain().name() && newDomain().bucket())" class="btn btn-info btn-large ">


<div id="domains-list"  data-bind="foreach: domains">
<hr>
    <h3 data-bind="text: name"></h3>
	 <input type='submit' value='Remove' data-bind="click: remove" class="btn btn-danger right " /><a class="btn btn-info right " onclick="$(this).next().toggle('fast')">Edit</a>
    <div style="display: none" class="form-actions">
        <h4 data-bind="text: bucket().name"></h4>


       <!-- Create new DNS record -->
 <label class="radio"> <input type=radio value='A'  data-bind="checked: newRecord().type"> A </label>
   <label class="radio"><input type=radio value='NS'  data-bind="checked: newRecord().type"> NS </label>
   <label class="radio"><input type=radio value='CNAME'  data-bind="checked: newRecord().type"> CNAME </label>
    <br> 
    <div data-bind="visible: newRecord().type() == 'A'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().ipAddress, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="IP Address">
	</div>
    <div data-bind="visible: newRecord().type() == 'NS'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().hostname, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="hostname">
	</div>
    <div data-bind="visible: newRecord().type() == 'CNAME'">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
        <input type=text data-bind="value: newRecord().hostname, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="hostname">
	</div>
    <input type='submit' value='Add record' data-bind="click: addRecord, enable: newRecord().valid() == true" class="btn btn-info " />
    <!-- /Create new DNS record -->

	<br> <br>

	 
        <table data-bind="foreach: records"  class="table table-striped table-bordered">
            <tr>
                <td data-bind="text: type" class="mark"></td>
                <td>
                    <div data-bind="visible: type() == 'A'">
                        <input type=text data-bind="value: name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
                        <input type=text data-bind="value: ipAddress, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="IP Address"></div>
                    <div data-bind="visible: type() == 'NS'">
                        <input type=text data-bind="value: hostname, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="hostname"></div>
                    <div data-bind="visible: type() == 'CNAME'">
                        <input type=text data-bind="value: name, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="Name">
                        <input type=text data-bind="value: hostname, valueUpdate: 'afterkeydown'" placeholder="hostname"></div>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <input type='submit' value='Remove record' data-bind="click: $parent.removeRecord"  class="btn btn-danger btn-small " />
                </td>
            </tr>
        </table>
    

    </div>

</div>

}}
